nodes.text: The Merchant Quarter was a sector in the city of Iziz on the planet Onderon where merchants conducted business with the citizens of the city and offworlders.

During the Blockade of Onderon, the Merchant Quarter was the site of protests and riots. Later, the area was severely damaged during the Second Battle of Onderon. The Jedi Exile and Mandalore Canderous Ordo joined the battle from orbit by landing a Basilisk war droid in the Merchant Quarter.
